name: ENERGY FEED
description:
Use your repository of energy reserves to fry enemies and dive headfirst into a dangerous facility.  Watch your energy reserves to avoid burning out, and aim right for the enemy's source of power for a nice boost where necessary.


CONTROLS

[1-4] Switch Weapon

[MOUSE0] Shoot

[WASD] Movement

Created in 3 days for Reload Magazine X In the Keep Mini-Jam #1.
